it.polimi.se2018.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player state and data. his active dice in hand is in position 0, convention
    Author:
    Matteo Formentin, Luca Genoni

      • insertDice

        public void insertDice(int line,
                       int column,
                       boolean adjacentR,
                       boolean colorR,
                       boolean valueR,
                       boolean firstInsert)
                throws WindowRestriction,
                       PlayerException
        Method used to insert the dice on the window pattern.
        Parameters:
        line - index of the window's line.
        column - index of the window's column.
        adjacentR - true if need to be near a dice, false otherwise.
        colorR - true if need to check this restriction.
        valueR - true if need to check this restriction.
        firstInsert - true if it insert a new dice for the turn.
        Throws:
        WindowRestriction - the specific exception of the insert.
        PlayerException - the exception regarding the state of the player.

      • removeDiceFromHand

        public Dice removeDiceFromHand()
                        throws NoDiceInHandException
        Throws:
        NoDiceInHandException

      • endSpecialFirstTurn

        public void endSpecialFirstTurn()
                         throws GameException
        the player can now place a new dice but the second turn will be skipped. Available when using a tool card
        Throws:
        GameException
